home.title: Direct Aid for Myanmar Earthquake Relief
home.subtitle: Support affected communities directly. 100% of donations reach those in need, with full transparency and verification.
home.howItWorksDescription: A secure platform connecting donors directly with verified recipients
home.registerDescription: Quick verification process for aid recipients
home.registerContent: Simple registration with identity verification to ensure all aid requests are legitimate and reach those most in need.
home.donateContent: Choose recipients based on needs and location. Send aid via bank transfer, mobile money, or cryptocurrency.
home.transparencyContent: Follow your donation's journey through our public ledger. Recipients confirm receipt and share updates on how the aid helps.
